ASOT is for *As Seen On Television*. I'm here to tell you when a Travaux.com ad is gonna be broadcast live on television.

Please click start button and I'll let you know 2 minutes before the broadcasting of the ad and I'll tell you what TV channel to watch.

I'll show you the complete list of planned ads in the next few days every time you'll click the list button
*Use the `/asot` command*, followed by one of the instructions I can understand and I'll execute it. You can also talk to me in DM
